programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E130
programme.desc: Una vez en el funeral de Fernanda quien prefirio suicidarse antes de ir a la crcel- Leopoldo consuela a su hija menor Eugenia mientras que Antonieta se refugia en los brazos de Felipe; Cada la noche, Adelaida recibe la visita de Victoria, quien ha llegado a la capital para asistir a la boda de su madre; sin embargo, Adelaida y Hansen han decidido posponerla por respeto al luto de Victoria; en ese momento, la conversacion entre madre e hija se ve interrumpida por la visita de Florencia, quien una vez a solas con Victoria le pide perdon por todo el dao que le causo; Florencia le entrega a Victoria los anillos que Nicols utilizara en su matrimonio y que ahora podr usar cuando Nicols firme el divorcio. Con el paso de los das, Nicols y Victoria contraen matrimonio ante un altar en compaa de sus familiares; all, Hilario le entrega a su hija la hacienda Cantarrana y todas sus tierras como regalo de bodas. Clementina acepta casarse con Felipe, quien se sorprende cuando su amada le informa que pronto ser pap. No muy lejos de all, Florencia se reencuentra con Hilario Guanipa, quien deseara escaparse con ella, pero Florencia le pide acompaarla siempre. Los recien casados cabalgan por Cantarrana, donde Victoria y Nicols se comprometen a luchar por el desarrollo de la hacienda y el crecimiento de su familia.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E19
programme.desc: Max impaciente, quiere saber de su hermana, Julia. El plan de ellos es intercambiarla por Ezequiel para luego matarlo. En un mensaje de voz Julia le comunica la hora y el da del intercambio y Max lo acompaar.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E20
programme.desc: Gregorio necesita escapar con Julia. Camila esta negada al amor, Jeli quiere que admita lo que siente por Max y ella le cuenta la razon del rechazo. En el orfanato habla con el Padre Tiziano y la Madre Isabel sobre Rosa Blanco; y cree que tiene que ver en este asunto y que es El Doliente.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E38
programme.desc: Clara le revela a Ral que su complice fue Elisenda.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E39
programme.desc: Edilio llega con la polica a arrestar a Clara; la joven insiste con su inocencia.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E39
programme.desc: The psychological warfare and threats of physical aggression from Pablo towards Malena are increasing; Isabel is with them, receiving her share of mistreatment - Claudio does not see the moment when he can make public his relationship with Gertrudis - Omar and his men burst into Lorenas annex in search of Guillermo, whom they already have fully identified.

programme.title: Wardens - S01:E13 - Operation Wardens
programme.desc: Working to protect our treasured natural resources in some of the countrys most secluded spots means theres never a boring day on the job.

programme.title: Wardens - S02:E01 - Operation OHV
programme.desc: Montana Game Wardens launched an operation to crack down on illegal off-road vehicle use. We also join a patrol along the Missouri River to ensure boaters are safe and following the rules.

programme.title: Dropped - S02:E03 - Band of Ten
programme.desc: The crew reaches a canyon where they find a group of ten rams. After the thrill of the first wave, they quickly become disappointed and frustrated when none of the rams are legally suitable.

programme.title: Miracles of Nature - S01:E01 - Naturally Breathtaking
programme.desc: Do you know where in the world the last untouched glacier is? Where is the highest and the smallest waterfall? Which desert is the driest or the largest? Would you like to know where the most inaccessible mountains, the lowest point of the oceans or the great salt deserts are? This series offers all the answers.In the first episode, we discover breathtaking glaciers in Argentina, infinite plane in the middle of Europe, thermal miracles of Hungary, stalactite caves protected by UNESCO and the most active volcano in New Zealand White island.

programme.title: The Luxury Travel Show - S01:E03 - St Tropez and St Lucia
programme.desc: In the South of France, 100 kilometres west of Nice, is the famous town of St Tropez. Once a sleepy fishing village, today it is quite possibly the most Jet-Set-Resort in Europe where the rich and famous holiday. Known as the most romantic island in the Caribbean we explore the beauty and everything St Lucia has to offer.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E25 - Kate The Making Of A Modern Queen
programme.desc: A look at the Duchess of Cambridges journey from being an everyday young woman to becoming a future queen, and what her evolution signifies for the royal family.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E26 - Prince William A Royal Portrait
programme.desc: Explore the exciting and intriguing life of the future king, Prince William, in this engaging documentary.

programme.title: Wardens - S02:E02 - Operation Antler Blitz
programme.desc: Montana Game Wardens investigate stolen antlers and join in conservation activities for sage grouse and walleye.

programme.title: Dropped - S02:E04 - Now or Never
programme.desc: As the mist drifts past the craggy top of Fish Hook, the crews shapes slowly come into view right where the ram had been resting. Did they fire without Chris hearing the sound?

programme.title: Miracles of Nature - S01:E02 - Naturally Dramatic
programme.desc: This episode describes the greatest miracle of nature that could be created by the human brain. The Loch Ness monster. It looks that is does not exist but thousands of visitors still come to see the lovely lake and to hear tales about it. Not only Nessi, but the Scottish high lands are the miracle of nature.Then we quickly visit Andalusia and remove our hat in front of the majestic mountains of Sierra Nevada.The deepest lake in the world is found in Siberia. We will talk about Baikal, the natural miracle of Russia.

programme.title: Miracles of Nature - S01:E03 - Naturally Diverse
programme.desc: The episode focuses on the Arabian peninsula. The endless red desert in Oman contrasts with Yemen s island of Socotra. The endemic crabs from Socotra compete with sea turtles who gather on a single beach in Oman to lay their eggs. And, it is also claimed that the petrified rock formation is of Noahs Ark.

programme.title: The Luxury Travel Show - S01:E05 - Parrot Cay and Algave
programme.desc: Portugals Algarve region has long attracted holidaymakers looking to relax and soak up the sun. Portugal is also quickly becoming known for its great tasting wines. But if Europe is too crowded for your travel tastes then how about the private island resort of Parrot Cay in the Caribbean Turks and Caicos Islands, where you can escape, relax and recharge your batteries in the lap of luxury.

programme.title: The Luxury Travel Show - S01:E06 - Barcelona and London
programme.desc: Located in Northern Spain, Barcelona is one of the most vibrant and cultural cities in Europe. The Luxury Travel Show explores many of the citys quirky and unique buildings designed by the famous architect, Antoni Gaudi. A city thats equally full of famous buildings is London where a helicopter tour along the River Thames offers birds eye views of London Bridge, The Houses of Parliament, the London Eye and so much more.

programme.title: Jim Shockeys Uncharted - S01:E08 - Goodbyes
programme.desc: Papua New Guinea. Jim heads to one of the most dangerous places on the planet while Corey, choosing to stay behind, takes his horse on a lone hunt through the badlands where he grew up.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E30 - Prince William And Prince Harry Prisoners Of Celebrity
programme.desc: Two young men who have had to cope with extraordinarily challenging events and circumstances as, together, they have gone on to change the face of the British royal family and carve meaningful roles for themselves in the modern world. Made in 1999 two years after the death of their mother, Princess Diana, this original and touching documentary examines the lives of the royal princes, the legacy of their mother, the responsibilities of being a royal - and what the future holds for them.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E26 - Prince William A Royal Portrait
programme.desc: Explore the exciting and intriguing life of the future king, Prince William, in this engaging documentary.

programme.title: Wardens - S02:E02 - Operation Antler Blitz
programme.desc: Montana Game Wardens investigate stolen antlers and join in conservation activities for sage grouse and walleye.

programme.title: Dropped - S02:E04 - Now or Never
programme.desc: As the mist drifts past the craggy top of Fish Hook, the crews shapes slowly come into view right where the ram had been resting. Did they fire without Chris hearing the sound?

programme.title: Miracles of Nature - S01:E02 - Naturally Dramatic
programme.desc: This episode describes the greatest miracle of nature that could be created by the human brain. The Loch Ness monster. It looks that is does not exist but thousands of visitors still come to see the lovely lake and to hear tales about it. Not only Nessi, but the Scottish high lands are the miracle of nature.Then we quickly visit Andalusia and remove our hat in front of the majestic mountains of Sierra Nevada.The deepest lake in the world is found in Siberia. We will talk about Baikal, the natural miracle of Russia.

programme.title: Miracles of Nature - S01:E03 - Naturally Diverse
programme.desc: The episode focuses on the Arabian peninsula. The endless red desert in Oman contrasts with Yemen s island of Socotra. The endemic crabs from Socotra compete with sea turtles who gather on a single beach in Oman to lay their eggs. And, it is also claimed that the petrified rock formation is of Noahs Ark.

programme.title: The Luxury Travel Show - S01:E05 - Parrot Cay and Algave
programme.desc: Portugals Algarve region has long attracted holidaymakers looking to relax and soak up the sun. Portugal is also quickly becoming known for its great tasting wines. But if Europe is too crowded for your travel tastes then how about the private island resort of Parrot Cay in the Caribbean Turks and Caicos Islands, where you can escape, relax and recharge your batteries in the lap of luxury.

programme.title: The Luxury Travel Show - S01:E06 - Barcelona and London
programme.desc: Located in Northern Spain, Barcelona is one of the most vibrant and cultural cities in Europe. The Luxury Travel Show explores many of the citys quirky and unique buildings designed by the famous architect, Antoni Gaudi. A city thats equally full of famous buildings is London where a helicopter tour along the River Thames offers birds eye views of London Bridge, The Houses of Parliament, the London Eye and so much more.

programme.title: Jim Shockeys Uncharted - S01:E08 - Goodbyes
programme.desc: Papua New Guinea. Jim heads to one of the most dangerous places on the planet while Corey, choosing to stay behind, takes his horse on a lone hunt through the badlands where he grew up.

Made in 1999 two years after the death of their mother, Princess Diana, this original and touching documentary examines the lives of the royal princes, the legacy of their mother, the responsibilities of being a royal - and what the future holds for them.

programme.title: Dropped - S04:E01 - To Be Alive
programme.desc: Chris and Casey Keefer check out video entries to pick a lucky pair to come with them to Alaska. The hunters meet each other at the airport for the first time. Casey and Kaid get Dropped off, while Chris and the rest face delays at the hangar.

programme.title: Dropped - S04:E02 - Separation Anxiety
programme.desc: The weather in Alaska eases up just enough for Chris and Kaid to make it to their destination and catch some food. Meanwhile, Casey and R.L. have already set up camp, gearing up for moose season. The brothers need to get used to the idea of being dropped off separately for the first time.

programme.title: Dropped - S04:E03 - Predators Prowl
programme.desc: Chris and Kaid were getting their rafts set up, while Casey and R.L. started looking around for black bears and moose. Just then, Chris and Kaid noticed a predator making its way towards their campsite.

programme.title: Dropped - S04:E04 - Cloudy Days
programme.desc: Its the second day of hunting season, and Chris and Kaid are still on the lookout for big game. They head downstream to see if they can find a better spot to catch some fish. Meanwhile, Casey and R.L. feast on salmon, getting some much-needed protein. Huge storm clouds are pouring over Alaska.

programme.title: Dropped - S04:E05 - Soaked Spirits
programme.desc: R.L. shares with Casey about the tough times that helped him understand why Be Alive matters so much. Chris and Kaid are stuck in the tent because of the harsh Alaskan weather. Meanwhile, Casey and R.L. manage to find some food.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E01 - Volcanoes
programme.desc: The Greatest Show on Earth is also the most ferocious. Desperate Hours looks at the destructive force of volcanoes and examines the eruptions in Montserrat which devastated half a Caribbean Island, the 1973 eruption on the Icelandic island of Heimaey, the 2010 eruption Eyjafjallajokull which blocked air travel in Europe, the Merapi eruption in Indonesia, and Mount Nyiragongo in Congo, and the super-volcano in Yellowstone.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E02 - Earthquake
programme.desc: When the Earth really moves, it means disaster on an epic scale. Desperate Hours looks at the destructive force of earthquakes and looks at the 2015 Kathmandu earthquake in Nepal, the 2008 Sichuan earthquake in China where an estimated 10,000 children were trapped in collapsed school buildings, a 1960 Puerto Mont earthquake in Chile, the 2010 Port-au-Princ earthquake in Haiti, and the 2005 Kashmir earthquake in Pakistan.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E03 - Epidemic
programme.desc: Desperate Hours looks at major epidemics including the African Ebola outbreak in Sudan which eventually led to cases in the United State and England, the Indian Smallpox outbreak in Bihar, the African Cholera outbreak, the SARS outbreak in Guanghzhou China, and the Bird Flu of Hong Kong.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E04 - Wind
programme.desc: Desperate Hours looks at the destructive power of wind. From the devastating power of Hurricane Katrina in New Orleans to the destructive Cyclone Nargis in Myanmar, the 1960 storm Hurricane Donna in Florida, Tornado Joplin in Missouri, and Hurricane Sandy in New York.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E05 - Fire
programme.desc: The blazing terror of a fire can match anything in creation for sheer menace. Desperate Hours looks at the destructive force of fires including the Black Saturday Bushfires in Victoria Australia, the Station Nightclub fire in Rhode Island, the LInnovation Department Store fire in Brussels Belgium, the Armoury fire in Lagos Nigeria, and the Binhai New Development Zone Fire in Tianjin China.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S03:E07 - Iraqi Sniper Attack
programme.desc: On deployment in Anbar Province, Marine Corp Master Sergeant Buck Doyle throws himself in harms way to save a fallen comrade from an Iraqi sniper and becomes a target himself.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S03:E08 - Lightning Strike
programme.desc: A bass fishing trip goes horribly wrong when a bolt of lightning strikes their boat, leaving Seventeen-year-old Christian Neal burned and unconscious and his father Gabe blown into the water and paralyzed. It will take a miracle to save them.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S03:E09 - Mountain Lion Attack
programme.desc: Marine Anne Hjelle was mountain biking when she was ripped off her bike by a mountain lion. Anne fought back even as the big cat shredded her face in its jaws. Surviving the attack was only the beginning of Annes incredible fight to survive.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S03:E10 - Soul of a Survivor
programme.desc: Craig DeMartino examines the stories of other survivors hes met across the season. Their survival stories are all different, but Craig discovers that these survivors share more in common than you might think.

programme.title: Rear View Mirror
programme.desc: A young mother tries to escape her abusive, controlling husband and start a new life in an idyllic, peaceful beach town.

programme.title: Love in Translation
programme.desc: Linguistics Ph.D. student Julie, can speak almost every language you can imagine. Things turn upside down for Julie when handsome Dan, contacts her to get some French classes. Sparks soon fly - could this be their perfect match?

programme.title: The Wedding Contest
programme.desc: When a couple cant decide on a wedding theme, they hire two wedding planners, Taylor and Ben, to compete for the job by proposing two very different styles.

programme.title: The Wedding in the Hamptons
programme.desc: Jenna is a fashion designer who works for her friends boutique. Their failing business was saved by a famous influencer. When Jenna comes to a lavish Hamptons wedding, she was mistaken for her, but she decides to go along to save business

programme.title: Love on the Reef
programme.desc: A smart and serious marine biologist and a fun-loving and laissez-faire dive instructor must team up to save their beloved reef from being destroyed before its too late.

programme.title: Love for Starters
programme.desc: To save her fathers lake-front restaurant, a talented interior designer must partner with the celebrity chef her father hired without her knowledge to revamp the place before time runs out.

programme.title: Love in Translation
programme.desc: Linguistics Ph.D. student Julie, can speak almost every language you can imagine. Things turn upside down for Julie when handsome Dan, contacts her to get some French classes. Sparks soon fly - could this be their perfect match?

programme.title: Sorority Secrets
programme.desc: Cassie is thrilled when shes accepted as a mid-year transfer into an elite sorority, complete with free housing, tuition assistance and a great alumni network. However, when Cassie uncovers that the chapter president and advisor are running an escort service with girls from the sorority she realizes this little secret just might kill her

programme.title: Killer Cover Up
programme.desc: All-star soccer player Jenna Sims and her mom Sally are ready for a new start when they move to a new, sunny beach town. But when other members of her new soccer team start turning up dead and one ends up in a coma, Jenna finds herself accused of the crime.

programme.title: Love in Translation
programme.desc: Linguistics Ph.D. student Julie, can speak almost every language you can imagine. Things turn upside down for Julie when handsome Dan, contacts her to get some French classes. Sparks soon fly - could this be their perfect match?

programme.title: Modeled with Love
programme.desc: When model-maker Olivias dad is set to retire from their firm, she believes shes the obvious pick to take over. Enter Simon, whose big picture thinking threatens to upend Olivias comfortable bubble along with her role as successor.

programme.title: Sail GP Highlights - S02:E05 - San Francisco Highlights
programme.desc: Get ready for the thrill of SailGP as the tour makes waves on the famous San Francisco Bay! This highlight video showcases the most exciting parts of the San Francisco Grand Prix, featuring lightning-fast starts, almost-collisions, clever tactics, and jaw-dropping finishes.

programme.title: E1 - S02:E07 - Re-Live Lake Maggiore Place Race and Finals
programme.desc: Tight merges and tactical racing made Final 1 an exciting showdown, with commentators calling it the tightest merge weve ever seen.

programme.title: FIBA World Basketball - S01:E52 - 22. Oktober 2025
programme.desc: Serbian superstar Nikola Jokic will again be the key to the reshaped Denver Nuggets title hopes.

programme.title: Melbourne Cup 2025 - S03:E01 - 2024 Melbourne Cup: Das epische Rennen
programme.desc: Relive the 2024 Melbourne Cup in an epic race film featuring the full story from Flemington. The race that stops a nation delivers drama, emotion, and world-class racing as champions chase glory over 3,200 metres.

programme.title: The Football Review - S05:E84 - Toxische Atmosphare bei Tottenham nach Niederlage
programme.desc: In todays episode, the atmosphere at Tottenham turns toxic after a disappointing loss to London rivals Chelsea, as the home faithful let their feelings be known.

programme.title: E1 Highlights - S02:E05 - Monaco
programme.desc: Experience the thrill of electric foiling at almost 50 knots with Monacos beautiful skyline as your backdrop, and dont miss the eco-focused talks happening around the event.

programme.title: Sport Confidential - S05:E47 - Sportliche Geheimnisse Episode
programme.desc: News from all across sports in this exciting episode of Sports Confidential. Vinicius Jr will be leading the line for Brazil at the 2026 World Cup.

programme.title: The Inside Line - S05:E47 - Formel Eins Brasilien 2023: Gabriel Bortoletos Debut
programme.desc: Formula Ones annual trip to Brazil is set for a huge boost this season, with Saubers Gabriel Bortoleto making his debut on the Sao Paulo grid.

programme.title: Sport Confidential - S05:E47 - Sportliche Geheimnisse Episode
programme.desc: News from all across sports in this exciting episode of Sports Confidential. Vinicius Jr will be leading the line for Brazil at the 2026 World Cup.

programme.title: The Inside Line - S05:E47 - Formel Eins Brasilien 2023: Gabriel Bortoletos Debut
programme.desc: Formula Ones annual trip to Brazil is set for a huge boost this season, with Saubers Gabriel Bortoleto making his debut on the Sao Paulo grid.

programme.title: E1 Highlights - S02:E04 - Lake Maggiore
programme.desc: Team Brady, led by Tom Brady, grabbed their first victory of the 2025 season with awesome efforts from Sam Coleman and Emma Kimilainen, who stood out in qualifying and the preliminary race.

programme.title: E1 Champions of the Water - S02:E07 - Didier Drogba im E1-Rennen
programme.desc: Football legend Didier Drogba experiences the highs and lows of E1 racing, as his team embarks on its first round in Africa. Team Drogba has their sights set on a podium in Lagos in front of the home crowd, but theyre in for a turbulent time.

programme.title: The Football Review - S05:E71 - 22 September 2025
programme.desc: Almost 25 years after his first time with Benfica, Jose Mourinho is returning to his old stomping grounds, signing on for another period with the Portuguese club.
